application

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    The Database class will be home to all methods which pertain to the local MySQL database for this project.
    Author:
    derekdileo

      Database() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createWordsTable(java.lang.String tableName)
      Method creates the standard words table within the database (if it does not exist already).
      static void delete(java.lang.String word)
      Method deletes desired word and frequency values from the words table
      static void deleteTable(java.lang.String tableName)
      Method drops a table within the database (if it exists).
      static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Method establishes a connection with local MySQL database
      static java.sql.ResultSet getResults()
      Method that queries database for * FROM words ORDER BY frequency DESC and returns a ResultSet.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Used for testing while coding and will be deleted later.
      static void post(java.lang.String word, int frequency)
      Method posts (inserts) desired word and frequency values into the words table
      static int queryFrequency(java.lang.String word)
      Method to query for a word and return its frequency (if present)- otherwise, frequency is set to -1.
      static void update(java.lang.String word, int frequency)
      Method updates the frequency (occurrences) of the selected word in the table

        public static void post(java.lang.String word,
                        int frequency)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Method posts (inserts) desired word and frequency values into the words table
        Parameters:
        word - is the desired word to be posted to the words table
        frequency - is the frequency of occurrence of the word in our program

      • delete

        Parameters:
        word - is the desired word to be removed from the words table
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • update

        public static void update(java.lang.String word,
                          int frequency)
        Method updates the frequency (occurrences) of the selected word in the table
        Parameters:
        word - is the target key whose frequency is to be updated
        frequency - is the new frequency of occurrence of the word in our program
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • queryFrequency

        public static int queryFrequency(java.lang.String word)
        Method to query for a word and return its frequency (if present)- otherwise, frequency is set to -1.
        Parameters:
        word - is the word to search for in the database
        Returns:
        frequency of the word (or -1 if word not present in db)

      • getResults

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getResults()
        Method that queries database for * FROM words ORDER BY frequency DESC and returns a ResultSet.
        Returns:
        ResultSet of query SELECT * FROM words ORDER BY frequency DESC
